participant_1.name: Sofia
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, Sofia enjoys engaging conversations about literature and culture. She has a playful sense of humor and often makes light-hearted comments.
participant_1.background: i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. my next language to study is french. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is practical and down-to-earth, with a love for the arts and an appreciation for history. He values education and enjoys sharing his thoughts.
participant_2.background: i can drive a tractor. i enjoy listening to classical music. my favorite color is red. my sister is a pole dancer. i'm a christian.

content.text: Hello! How is your going? I like to read and write. I am a student.

Hi there. I'm fine. What is your favorite book?
I like to read a lot.
I like to read a lot
my favorite color is red. what is your favorite color?
I like red, reminds me of summer time.
What do you feel about my person? I like red, reminds me of summer time.
i'm a christian there is a lot of holidays I have on summer! i can drive a tractor into your house if you won't be my friend. Do you want to?
Sure, I am a student so I can speak french

my sister is a pole dancer and it's a way better profession than a teacher. Teaching is for machines because they can be updated with fresh information as fast as possible, not as humans
